sensing.why-did-touch-sprite: Why did the condition touching {sprite}? evaluate to true?
sensing.why-did-not-touch-sprite: Why didn't the condition touching {sprite}? evaluate to true?
sensing.why-did-touch-edge: Why did the condition touching edge? evaluate to true?
sensing.why-did-not-touch-edge: Why didn't the condition touching edge? evaluate to true?
sensing.why-did-touch-mouse: Why did the condition touching mouse-pointer? evaluate to true?
sensing.why-did-not-touch-mouse: Why didn't the condition touching mouse-pointer? evaluate to true?
sensing.why-did-touch-color: Why did the condition touching color ⬤ ? evaluate to true?
sensing.why-did-not-touch-color: Why didn't the condition touching color ⬤ ? evaluate to true?

sensing.why-did-not-color-touch-color: Why didn't the condition color ⬤ is touching color ⬤ ? evaluate to true?

operator.why-did-not-meet-compare-condition: Why didn't the condition {value1} {operator} {value2} evaluate to true?

variable.why-did-have-value: Why did variable {variable} have the value {value}?
variable.why-did-not-have-value: Why didn't variable {variable} have the value {value}?

list.why-did-have-value: Why did list {list} have the value {value}?

sensing.touching-sprite-edge:
Sprite {sprite} was at position ({spriteX},{spriteY}).
Because of that the sprite touched the edge at the positions highlighted in red in the picture.
sensing.touching-sprite-mouse:
Sprite {sprite} was at position ({spriteX},{spriteY}), the mouse-pointer was at position ({mouseX},{mouseY}).
Because of that the sprite touched the mouse-pointer as shown in the picture.
sensing.touching-sprite-sprite:
Sprite {sprite1} was at position ({sprite1X},{sprite1Y}), sprite {sprite2} was at position ({sprite2X},{sprite2Y}).
Because of that the sprites touched each other at the positions highlighted in the picture.
sensing.touching-sprite-color:
Sprite {sprite} was at position ({spriteX},{spriteY}).
Because of that the sprite touched the selected color at the positions highlighted in the picture.
sensing.touching-color-color: The colors touched each other at the positions highlighted in the picture.
sensing.distance-sprite-edge:
Sprite {sprite} was at position ({spriteX},{spriteY}).
Because of that the minimal distance to the edge was {distance}.
sensing.distance-sprite-mouse:
Sprite {sprite} was at position ({spriteX},{spriteY}), the mouse-pointer was at position ({mouseX},{mouseY}).
Because of that the minimal distance to the mouse-pointer was {distance}.
sensing.distance-sprite-sprite:
Sprite {sprite1} was at position ({sprite1X},{sprite1Y}), sprite {sprite2} was at position ({sprite2X},{sprite2Y}).
Because of that the minimal distance of the sprites was {distance}.
sensing.distance-sprite-color:
Sprite {sprite} was at position ({spriteX},{spriteY}).
Because of that the minimal distance to the selected color was {distance}.
sensing.distance-color-color: The minimal distance of the colors was {distance}.
sensing.sprite-invisible: Sprite {sprite} can not be touched, because it is invisible!
sensing.sprites-invisible: Sprite {sprite1} and sprite {sprite2} can not touch each other, because they are invisible!
sensing.nonexistent-color:
The color ⬤ does not occur!
Try to select the desired color with the color picker.
sensing.nonexistent-colors:
The colors ⬤ and ⬤ do not occur!
Try to select the desired colors with the color picker.
